option.ijmtweaks.darkLoadingOverlay.name: Dark Loading Overlay
option.ijmtweaks.darkLoadingOverlay.desc: Set the background color of the loading overlay to black.
option.ijmtweaks.pumpkinOverlayOpacity.d: Raise or lower the opacity value of the pumpkin's overlay.
option.ijmtweaks.blockBreakParticle.name: Block Break Particle Reduction
option.ijmtweaks.blockBreakParticle.desc: Reduce the number of particles created when a block is broken. An higher number means fewer particles.
option.ijmtweaks.experienceBarInCreative: Show the experience bar in creative mode.
option.ijmtweaks.autoJumpOnStairs.name: Auto-Jump on Stairs
option.ijmtweaks.autoJumpOnStairs.desc: Automatically enable the auto-jump when climbing stairs.
option.ijmtweaks.zoomLevel.name: Zoom Level
option.ijmtweaks.zoomLevel.desc: Adjust the zoom level. Lower this value to increase the zoom level. The keybinding can be changed in the Minecraft options.
option.ijmtweaks.fireOverlay.name: Fire Overlay
option.ijmtweaks.fireOverlay.desc: Reduce the height or disable the visibility of the fire overlay.
